snippet: "In the morning we are going on to Alabama. We're going on to Mississippi. We're going on to Kansas, and that's just this week," Newt Gingrich told an enthusiastic crowd celebrating his win in Georgia.
abstract: "In the morning we are going on to Alabama. We're going on to Mississippi. We're going on to Kansas, and that's just this week," Newt Gingrich told an enthusiastic crowd celebrating his win in Georgia.

headline.main: Gingrich Vows to Move South After Georgia Win
